name: SCCMDeploy
author: Valentin LECERF
releaseNotes: Initial implemention for deploy to sccm.

inputs.name: sccmcredentials
inputs.label: SCCM Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: SCCM Service connection with credential and hostname

inputs.name: SccmSiteCode
inputs.label: SCCM Site Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: SCCM Site Code for your organization.

inputs.name: UniquePackageName
inputs.label: Unique name for SCCM Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique name for SCCM Package will be created in the collection, generally we mentionned name and version.

inputs.name: PackagePath
inputs.label: Package path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to your .appx generated and copied to shared drive location.Must be shared drive as SCCM only support UNC.

inputs.name: SccmFolderPath
inputs.label: Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location for you package in SCCM folder structure.

inputs.name: dpGroups
inputs.label: Distribution points
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of name of distribution groups seperated by a comma.Example: DP1,DP2,DP3

inputs.name: collectionName
inputs.label: Deployment Collection Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: SCCM Collection Name for package deployment scope

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of your application visible for users from software center

inputs.name: appDescription
inputs.label: Application Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of your application visible for users from software center

inputs.name: appIcon
inputs.label: Application Icon Shared Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Icon of your application visible for users from software center. Must be shared location, generally icon is copied on root app folder of shared drive where you copied your appx

inputs.name: appKeyword
inputs.label: Application Keyword
inputs.helpMarkDown: Keyword of your application visible for users from software center.

inputs.name: appVersion
inputs.label: Application Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of your application visible for users from software center need to respect semantic.

inputs.name: appPublisher
inputs.label: Application Publisher
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publisher Name of your application visible for users from software center.
